hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uqbah bin Al-Harith said:"I prayed 'Asr with the Prophet (ﷺ) in Al-Madinah, then he left, stepping over the necks of the people, so quickly that the people were surprised at his haste. He entered unto one of his wives, then he came out and said: 'While I was praying 'Asr, I remembered some gold that we had, and I did not want it to stay with us overnight, so I ordered that it be distributed

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ لِلإِمَامِ فِي تَخَطِّي رِقَابِ النَّاسِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing the imam to step over the necks of the people
